attributes.action: Please help us ask for the whereabouts of British citizen Nnamdi Kanu
attributes.additional_details:
It's been almost two months since his house was invaded and he was taken away with his father and few members of his family. About 26 people were murdered in the process.
I'm calling on the British government to please get involved in this and ask Nigerian government for the whereabouts of its citizens.
attributes.background:
Nnamdi Kanu is missing.
He was arrested by the Nigerian government in 2015 and was released on bail after spending over 18months in jail.
Few months after his release and while on bail, the Nigeria Army invaded his home, took him away to an unknown destination!

rejection.details: The British High Commission in Nigeria has already been involved, so we're not sure what further action you would like the UK Government to take.
